sentence.Network_en: The containers loaded with the dough are hermetically closed.
sentence.Network_cn: 装药团的容器应紧密密封.

sentence.Network_en: And the boudoir - grand piano, beautifully dusted , hermetically sealed as ever.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有这座小三角式钢琴, 收拾得洁无纤尘, 照旧严封固扃.

sentence.Network_en: The probe unit is hermetically sealed.

entry.def: If a container has a hermetic seal, the seal is very tight so that no air can get in or out.

example.ex: This would permit air to enter, breaking the hermetic seal of the jar.
example.tran: 这会造成漏气，破坏罐子的密封性。

entry.tran: 与外界隔绝的;不受外界干扰的
entry.def: You use hermetic to describe something which you disapprove of because it seems to be totally separate from other people and things in society.

example.ex: Its film industry operates in its own curiously hermetic way...
example.tran: 其电影产业以它奇特的与世隔绝的方式运作。

example.ex: Their work is more cosily hermetic than ever.
example.tran: 他们的工作比任何时候都要更加安逸，更加不受外界干扰。

auth_sentence.content: Yet who could deny that their hermetically sealed world is still alluring?
